content.detailedDescription:
Was at lake rancho santa margarita with my close friend facing towards the saddleback mountains in the direction of riverside county walking around the lake when i saw a shootin star, then about 3 or 4 more were seen in all different directions in a period of less than half an hour. at that time i looked up and saw a star like object but the color of this object wasn't considered ordinary to me. also at this time a small aircraft looking model plane with two small lights blinking on each side as it's silhouette to me appeared to glide silently at a pretty low altitude about 400 yards away it and an altitude of about maybe 500 ft and disappeared into the darkness as it went over some trees.I zoomed in with apps i downloads to see it but still couldn't make it out. from the ground with the naked eye it looked liked a blue aurora around a blue cross, at. this time i downloaded another app that would allow me to zoom in 30x and that's when i started to see strange shapes and colors such as blue black white green mixed together sometimes this object and others i began to notice nearby were taking. i wasn't able to take any video because i id ident have enough zoom to even see them and i couldn't find any apps of that high magnification to take a video of them with that detail. i sat there and observed these things which were orbs, then snakelike then circular see through colored of dusts it appeared. the funny thing was that these objects hovered and in place and barely moved and never faded away or disappeared. i was transfixed by them for a total of about three hours before i decided to just leave. hopefully the pictures will make up for my descriptive writing skills.



i also have many other photos i have taken that night i would like to send as well someway but it looks as though i'm limited to ten. so i tried to pick the best but i would really like to show them all.
content.summary: Multiple shaped objects that changed color and shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the road, when i noticed how clear the sky was, i kept trying to quickly glance out the window to get a look at the stars, then i seen a bright light...And thaught wow that is the brightest star i have everseen..Looked again to see if it was star...And it was falling.. (it lasted all of 2 secs and dissapeared behind the trees)and i noticed that my son had quit talking...As i was looking over at him i was telling him i just saw a shooting star....And then almost at the same time we were saying shooting stars dont fall down...So i say to him you saw that too?  yes, he said, that was bright, and i dont think it was a star.     
i was very curious, but i had to focus on driving, the road we were on was hilly, curvy,and very dark.
content.summary: A bright object fall from the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a photo of the sunset at the base of the grapevine outside of bakersfield, ca and it wasn't until i reviewed the photo later that i noticed three bright green lights forming a triangle in the sky. while i took the photo i didn't hear anything or see anything only noticed the object later.
content.summary: 3 bright green lights forming triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was in the passenger side of the car, and saw lights moving in the sky. i grabbed my phone to record it on camera. my mom thought it was search lights? a car came up behind us so we had to turn the corner.
content.summary: 2 lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
November 29th 2014 at two pm. i was outside in the park and knotts berry farm fun park, with my family. while my wife an older son, were waiting in line for a roller coaster ride, i was with my younger sun when i looked up and saw a jetliner around 10,000 ft. making a long con trail in the sky.

i then suddenly saw what appeared to be a brite light, and after observing it i reached for my blackberry cell phone and i took four pictures. i observed a huge egg shaped ufo decending towards a jetliner in the sky.

the distance covered from the ufo from when i first saw it, to where the ufo appears closer to the jetliner is astonishing. jets fly around 700 hundred miles an hour, and the ufo decended at an alarming speed, which my pictures do show the distance covered. the roller coaster, the jetairliner, the sun, and the con trail, are all in the picture.

i am a military retired veteran, and i very observant to many things, and just the size of what my pictures show, proves that something enormous was flying close to a jetairliner.

toal observation time was a few minutes, do to the fact i was watching the jetliner con trails in the sky. toatal ufo time was only a few minutes.

michael fenn december 2nd 2014 1900 hours

buena park in california is the location of the event.
content.summary: Looked 7 times bigger then a jet liner that was flying below (huge orb like egg)

content.detailedDescription: Basically, when i came off watch last night, i saw a ufo. now, i am not for one minute suggesting little green men in a space ship but i certainly saw something flying that i could not identify! i was having a smoke after my watch, and idly staring out to sea, as we were about five miles off the coast. after a few minutes i spotted a light above the horizon which initially i thought was maybe mars or venus, but then realised the cloud cover was too great and there were no stars visible. intrigued, i watched the light appear to hover in one spot. i thought it might have been a cab but all ours were on the flight deck and we were not expecting anything inbound. so maybe it was a local one? not when it started manoeuvring! it climbed slowly at first, in a gentle arc of about thirty degrees, which ok could have been a normal aircraft, but then it reversed course and shot away at a hell of a speed. no way was it a helicopter and it can’t have been a fixed wing aircraft because it hovered – if we still had harriers i would have put it down to that. there were no navigation lights visible just a bright, yellowish light akin to the landing light of a hawk if you get my meaning? anyway it shot off and disappeared. i thought to myself, that was a bit strange! bugger me if it didn’t come back about five minutes later! it came out of nowhere and proceeded to hover again – though it was impossible to gauge the distance because without a clue what it was i have no idea of size. it hovered, shadowing the ship it appeared for a few minutes, then climbed toward land before rapidly reversing course again, this time in a different direction. the speed of the turn was phenomenal, and the acceleration astounding. after zipping across the sky it appeared to shoot off upward and disappear again! i know it sounds like a crap entry for a creative writing course but i swear this is what i saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Odd hovering light observed above horizon - witnessed from ship at anchor

content.detailedDescription:
I just walked in my room and looked out my window and seen this object.
to the naked eye it looked like a orb so i got my moto g and taken some pictures, and the object was changing colours and shape. i have seen this object before reported it just like this one.
update: i seen this object again at 7:20 then some black helicopters.
time of sighting: 7:20pm uk time
date of sighting: tuesday 2nd december 2014
location of sighting:maghull liverpool.
content.summary: Strange object that changed shape and colour

content.detailedDescription:
Tryed to get this out in real time to give heads up to anyone se of me. but it kept telling me required.By now its in illinois if it didnt turn.

 heard high speed turn of a jet. went out to see whats going on and a f-16 was making a turn east of me.Flew over heading west then started to bank north. the thing it was chasing came over the trees nw of me. it looked like a tube with wings no tail, prop or engine and moving faster then a prop plane in a straight line. no noise from the object.
i could see that the f-16 had pods under wing. 
 the f-16 was doing figure 8s around it passing down one side to head on to the other side.(it looked like the f-16 was playing chicken with it and it did not flinch!) f-16 passed by it within 2-3 lengths of it. it was about the size of the f-16. lost sight of it because of trees. the f-16 was following it behind and to the left was the last thing i saw.  

 if it stayed on course it should have passed by rosendale,eldorado,sw of fond du lac, oakfield, knowles, theresa. if it made it that far it could have passed between milwakee and waukesha
content.summary: Being chased by f-16. f-16 was doing figure 8s around it and passing/head-on with in 300 to 500 ft

content.detailedDescription: Sorry i do not own a camera. i am camping inside city limits between 7;00 and 8;00 pm. saw dim amber lights in the north northeast sky fling a straight path to a south direction. in a low flight observed 7 objects fling in a c patteren. i would guess somewhere between 500 to 800 feet from where i was they turned off their lighting before passing over my head. i was able to see one seem to appear grey and spherical then disappeared even with a moon light sky i could not see anything a 3 more spheres had done the same one at a time .Turned off their light and disappeared . as i looked in the direction they were going looking to see if i could watch them move across the sky to which the crafts had vanished but in the direction they were moving several miles away i noticed a very large craft moving away from me in a southern direction   away from me .Along the middle were white lights with blue and red lights flashing across from left to right in the row of white lights. it was also low fling .  indianapolis , indiana
content.summary: Observed 10 objects unusual had amber light and turned off light before fling over head and 1 disc shape with white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a smoke outside in the drive way, starring up at the evening stars. noticed a light moving . nothing unusual, could have been a satellite. except that as i continued watching the lights path i noticed it was not moving in a linear line rather in a slow wide arc. that was when i noticed a secondary light mirroring its flight path. (it looked like an effect one could achieve if a light was attached at each end of a spinning stick)
the object was flying directly at me. i heard nothing, saw no outline of a fuselage or body. the only way i knew it was coming at me was because the lights got progressively wider as it moved. it travelled directly over top of me silently. it must've been huge because how far apart the lights where when it went over the me. i would guess a 150'-200'.
it creeped me out. but then again this was not the first encounter.
content.summary: Two spinning lights moving towards observer

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on highway 53 one mile north of ray, mn. saw v shaped lights in the air green, red and orange, color kind of changed. looked like it was going to crash but vanished like someone shutting off a light. thought it could have been a kite with lights but no houses in area. kinda freaked me out!
content.summary: Paper airplane shape, red green and orange saw for 5 seconds then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Residía en las afueras por lo que el cielo nocturno era bien visible.
alzando la vista al cielo por casualidad vi lo que creí ser un globo en
llamas a mucha altura. se desplazaba lentamente y fue descendiendo hasta
situarse a poca altura tras el chalet de en frente de mi casa, entonces se vio que el tamaño era enorme pues sobrepasaba la altura del chalet. totalmente silencioso. lo de las llamas era una primera impresión, en realidad tenía un brillo rojo anaranjado cambiante, después se fue elevando cada vez más rápido hasta que solo ví un punto destelleante y finalmente mi agudeza visual ya no pude distinguirlo entre las estrellas.2
content.summary: Spherical ufo, silent, glowing like flames

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8 pm, me and a friend were near a railing watching some fireworks while we noticed something flying across the sky. at first we though it was the flames coming out of the fireworks and but then it looked to be an orange glowing star and was quite closer than how a real star would appear. soon more of them appeared one after the other and flew across the sky. there were around 4-5 spotted. some were glowing and fading randomly while other flew across. there were also planes seen in the sky but these sightings looked very different from them. i took some pictures and a video. in a picture it appeared to be a small orb/dot and when zoomed it clearly looked like an orange fireball ball with an extreme bright yellowish square at the centre. they travelled at a steady speed if looked from the ground, similar to other fireball sightings i've heard about, but their actual speed was hard to predict. we were shocked because we had never seen anything like this before and immediately thought of reporting this. the objects were not seen anymore more when they flew behind a building.
content.summary: Orange fireball with a bright square at the centre !

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home from work at around 1:10am i headed south bound on the 215 and as i came up along side uc riverside i noticed 4-5  glowing orange lights that were only a few hundred feet up that seem to be hovering and scanning the area below. the lights seemed to flicker almost like a flame on a candle. another car and myself pulled over on the side of the freeway to take video of the ufos and after about 3 mins of watching them they soon started to fade away into the clouds in different directions and as they flew away their lights became dimmer. 

after that i head up to a local park to see if maybe i could catch a better view and maybe see the source of were they came from. when i located the area they were hovering above i noticed what looked like smoke rising from the general area of where the ufos were hovering. the smoke seemed to settle down like as if someone put out a bonfire. 

after that i headed home! 


i checked ucr page to see if maybe some type of chinese new year event was going on or something because they resembled chinese lanterns only the ufos seem to be on a path and not just floating straight up into the air. 

*another note*

its thanksgiving break so i know a lot of the students are gone this week. also it couldn't be drones because these lights were orange and pulsing.
content.summary: 4-5 bright orange objects in the sky, faded alway in all different directions

content.detailedDescription: Was driving back from dropping my son off at work,coming through park on my way back home at around 7.05am, it was still quite dark,i saw 2 bright white lights which caught my eye, i looked up and saw a oblong shape moving across horizontally,as much as i could see it had a dark grey appearence,there was no sound, and it looked as if it was low down in the sky,i had to carry on driving as there was traffic behind me, i turned around when i got a chance and went back, but it had gone, i did see the same object and lights about 4 years ago in the town where i live,only that time it hovered above a shop roof and tilted to the right, i was so mesmerised that i didnt feel scared, i felt quite calm actually,i turned away and when i looked back again it was high up in the sky, i got home in a minuite as i only lived down the road, when i got in there was a power cut in my area,dont know if it had anything to do with what i saw,i would have thought that other people must have seen these objects, at the same time.
content.summary: Oblong shape,2 bright white lights on each end , travelling horizontally,dark grey colour, travelling in car, when 2 bright lights caught my eye,looked up and saw object moving slowly across the sky, have seen it before about 4 years ago over where i live

content.detailedDescription: I was at work in northern bc,and noticed how nice the sunrise was,so decided to take a few pics of it with my cellphone. i noticed an object above and to the left (north) of the sun that i initially thought to be a high altitude jet contrail. i'm a spotter,and so watched it for a minute or two. it wasn't acting like a contrail. no motion to speak of...Just sitting there not changing shape like a cloud or contrail would. i observed the object and took a few photos over a period of 10-15 minutes....And then it simply vanished.
content.summary: Observed a bright object at high altitude.Was not moving,initially looked like contrail,but never changed

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying on a commercial american airlines flight from tucson to chicago. at around 5:30pm on december 1, 2014 the pilot announced we were passing over kansas city. i wanted to try out the time-lapse function on my iphone so i started videotaping out the window.  while filming i saw a streak of light pass right below us crossing our path.  i perceived it to be going extremely fast, much faster than we were going. my thought was a missile or a jet fighter.  i kind of rule out a missile however because it seemed to keep a steady altitude.  the two things that struck me were how close the object was in crossing our path and the extreme rate of speed. the pilot was kind of yammering about flight time (we were late taking off) but when the object crossed our path he seemed to stop talking mid-sentence.

i am including the video i took. unfortunately because it is time lapse,  there seems to only be three frames with the object.  the entire clip is about 8 seconds although it was probably about a minute of actual time.   the object begins in the bottom right of the video at about the two second mark.  if you advance the video frame by frame it appears from the middle-to-right  of the bottom of the frame and exits the middle of the right side of the frame. the first appearance is the best, the next frame it appears along with the city lights, and then the third frame it appears less intense.

i did overhear another passenger attempt to describe it to one of the stewardesses.
content.summary: On commercial flight from tucson to chicago saw object crossing path of flight over kc

content.detailedDescription: I was at home it was the evening id say around 6:04 pm on monday 12/1/14 my dogs were barking and i was sent out t see what it was and they were howling then i looked up and the see and i saw what i believe was a ufo i thought it was i ufo it had a bunch of blue and white lights with a blue blinking one i was socked that i saw what i believe was a ufo and i lose sight of the ufo because it was moving like it it had somewhere it had to be
content.summary: It was blue with with and was very big and have a blue blinking light i have a picture

content.detailedDescription:
I saw something very strange the night of november 29, 2014.
it was like nothing i'd ever seen before in my life. 

these orange red amber lights. i was visiting at my in laws house talking with my mother in law, she saw them out the window and we went outside because we knew immediately it was not an airplane. 

from where we were near a golf course on a hill looking out north and it's dark in the sky so you get a very good view at night. it appeared they were coming from the west or southwest but downtown lights made it hard to see them until they were almost right over our heads. 

first it was 3 red amber lights that seemed to be in a triangular formation moving northeast, they moved silently holding altitude until they moved out of our sight. then more amber lights followed, some moving singularly others in pairs. i went and got my husband and he and my father in law came outside and watched them too. 

many more lights came and did the same thing. they seemed to be gliding and were completely silent. they moved northeast towards altoona then some moved off north towards ankeny. my husband tried to take a video on his phone but it is really hard to see the lights and isn't very good. 

they didn't appear to "float" upward, they seemed to all be around the same altitude about where a helicopter would fly, even as they appeared and then moved out of sight then new light would show up in a pair or single. but no sound at all, none. the lights we saw didn't blink or flicker it was more of a very slow pulse, a little dimmer then brighter or just a solid color all the time. we saw them over the course of maybe 5 mins or so until no more came. very weird!

in total i think we saw 12 different lights. they didn't appear to be connected to each other and like i said some seemed to be flying together and others by themselves. 

i think it was around 5:45 or 6:00pm at night. it was dark out but not late at night. we had just got home from christmas shopping and were going to pick our kids up at my in-laws house. we had decided to stay and visit or we would have never seen the "lights".

i wasn't drinking and what i saw were not chinese lanterns because the wind was blowing out of the north that night so they couldn't have been moving into the wind like they were. my husband thinks they are military drones (and still does) so i asked a military friend about drones. he said it is unlikely that drones would be flying together. 

so i don't know what they were but i wanted others to hear about what i saw in case they have an experience like this too. i was with 4 other people who saw the same thing i did and it was very weird. not scary just weird. although, the more thought i've put into it the more it has bothered me that i can't figure out what they were. anyone have any thoughts on what these could be?
content.summary: Orbs in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Husband and i at campsite  at los padres national forest we were facing east looking at the sky. a greenish lite flashed in the sky lighting a specific area (east facing) this occurred 3 times. we noticed a white orb in sky different than starlight.  the orb then glowed very brightly once then again. 
the object made an odd zigzag manuever up then down and over, stopped then proceeded to head fairly quickly to the west.  this object was not very high in the sky and was quite visible. felt nauseous and nervous with buzzing in head.  this is not our first sighting but i always feel physically nauseous with theses encounters.
content.summary: 3 greenish flashes lit sky up, then orb appreared, orb then flahed white light twice.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the very crowded 118 and saw two large bright lights that slightly pulsated, one smaller than the other kind of hovering together and thought they were helicopters, but opened my window and didn't hear anything and they were very, very bright. they separated, the smaller one moved toward simi valley and the larger one remained still. i saw a broken line of light shooting out of the larger one horizontally to something smaller that would then light up. the freeway was packed so i'm sure there were many other witnesses to this sight. i was driving like a maniac trying to see this thing and could not take a photo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 pulsating objects which separate and then one shoots a beam to some other object.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and noticed a long bright orange light from the west. the light was the most intense in the center and the at the ends but it was constant, almost like fiber optic. it appeared to be 50 yards wide, just a few meters tall, and 2-3 miles away. the object was hovering. my drive takes me up a down a few hills so i would lose sight of it for a few seconds but then regain sight and it would be in the same location. i'm naturally skeptical of these things (my wife and i have argued over the existence of aliens and ufos for years) and i've never seen anything like it so i stopped to take a picture. when i parked and stepped out of my car the object rotated in place and was now very narrow and was shining white. almost like a position light. the object than flew west in a straight line and vanished quickly. as it vanished a blueish burst of light engulfed the object. this happened so fast i wasn't able to capture a picture. i was so curious i drove towards where it had just been hoping to see some evidence of something but found none. i wouldn't believe any of this had i not seen it myself. truly unexplainable.
content.summary: Orange rod shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside of the holiday inn having a cigar in a somewhat open but covered area while waiting for my wife who was teaching a class at the convention center (kccc). it was evening with a bluebird sky and occasional cloud floating by. i was watching the light/shadows on the buildings (i am an artist and sailing enthusiast who in the 70's could identify every extant military aircraft...I had the redeyes!). the ground winds were 10mph from the north. there was no alarm upon sighting the ufo. i noted the time at 7:02 (i just do stuff like that!). first instinct was aircraft but quickly reconsidered by lack of movement. i was sitting on a park bench with a back and moved myself over about a foot so the ufo was against a textured concrete column. no movement at all...No wind drift, nothing! since i hadn't a scale on the craft, there was no guessing altitude or distance. if it was the size of a cola can, it would have been about 300 yards away and 150' in altitude. were it the size of a silo it could have been 12-15 miles from me. it was above the kccc which is approx  60' tall. at first when the sun was higher i had no idea of the shape, but as the sun lowered the object reflected the yellow orange light and i could see that is was the shape of a tylonol caplet. i had a quartering view and it was perpendicular the sun. the craft had no perceivable details, but again could have been very far away. there was a man sitting on bus bench between myself and the object about 35 yards away and i, not being one that shys away from engaging strangers, started walking toward him to ask if he saw it, but his bus came and i went back to the bench. i kept it in sight going but was walking away from it returning. it was gone at 7:25.
content.summary: Did not move-?Cola can,300 yards,?Silo,7-9 miles-reflected low sun-i'm sitting with ufo against column-ground wind 10-15mph

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday we were bbqing . flying my ar drone for fun
looked at the videos i recorded & noticed a orb just sitting in the sky
content.summary: White or silver orb hovering observed with my ar drone 2

content.detailedDescription: Muy raro todo, se apagaron las luces y luego senti presencia rara
content.summary: Me senti muy raro al otro y me encontraron un objeto largo por el ano

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on a7. sudden appearance of spherical airborne craft moving at extreme speed. moved from behind car and travelled over mountain in front before sighting lost. no trail behind. i witnessed a meteor sighting this past summer in granada and this was not the same. it was a greyish/silver craft moving many times faster than a fighter jet or similar. searching web for other witnesses - not many cars on road but some. anyone looking out through windscreen would have seen the craft. the passengers in my car were not looking out at the time.
content.summary: Spherical craft above motorway a7 direction motril-málaga moving at extremely high speed 1000mph+

content.detailedDescription: I saw a amber reddish orange ufo right over the middle of the block i live on i went outside to have a smoke i went out front at 10:30 pm and walked to the east of my house onto my drive strips i turned and looked north and saw a super bright amber reddish orange object it was over the court behind my house its the middle of the block i live on it was hovering then i saw it drop like it was going to land so i ran in woke my mother and brother up so they can see im on heavy pain meds for my severe fibromyalgia so i wanted to have witnesses and it was at tree top level and hovered for a good 10 minutes it was wobbling and it was egg shape with reflective surface it was reflecting its own amber light on the bottom of it then after staying in one spot it was bobbing up and down and side to side it took off went behind my cypris trees in the back yard so i went in the loft where my mother was and saw it drop molten metal twice it was over houses when it dropped it and then it got real dim then flared up so bright then took off so fast i ran to the back yard and didnt see it anymore it was gone i want to talk to someone please email me before i dont pick up my phone if i dont know who it is but my mom is worried about me talking to anyone or write the reports she thinks that the government will take my ssi disability away if they dont want me reporting this about ufo's i want to be apart of this operation on finding out about ufo sightings i have nothing to do all day because im in super bad pain 24/7 like now im fighting hard to sit here and type this and i feel the last guy didnt believe me about the ufos i seen he made it like its because of my meds trust me its not the meds i believe in the aliens and ghosts i see hear feel get touched by ghosts i seen them since i was a kid please email me before calling so ill know or email me your number and ill call you thank you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a ufo over my neighborhood at 10:30 pm in antioch califorina

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the back porch on thanks giving day a storm was developing, so i took a shot of the area that was dark while the sun was shined through.The original photo is a lot better then what i am giving you because its on my wife's phone.
the object when zoomed out is gray sphere with 5 white pixels separated like a dice yes like roll the dice, below this sphere is what looks like a cigaret smoke ring that is some distance away but is from this ufo.
content.summary: Captured in a photo !

content.detailedDescription:
We were setting up the light show for toronto's "cavalcade of lights" at nathan phillips square when we noticed that one of our spots (we had several doing a figure of 8 tracking motion upward) was hitting an object in the sky and reflecting light off of it. 

after observing it for a moment we noticed a ring of light and then a spot. over the course of the next half hour the object moved north about 200' and appeared to rise and descend occasionally. 

toward the end of the sighting the object became very bright, 7 lights were now visible in a pattern with the circle in front and at this point we found we could reflect our lights off of it at an angle creating a lateral beam in an adjacent cloud. shortly after it disappeared.

we did not stop our spots to focus on the object because of the risk that could impose if the object was indeed a commercial aircraft.

the video i have was taken right at the beginning of the sighting when only a reflection could be seen, the photos that fallow create a timeline. 

i've also included photos edited to define the object and separate it from my spot lights.
content.summary: 7 spots of light and a circle. object also reflected light.

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on midway blvd. i came to a stop behind a few cars in the middle of the road, people were looking up to the north. i head a low humming and saw a pretty large white orb, inside was a small pill sized and shaped black/ metallic "ufo". it was changing colors, moved abruptly up and down , east and west, then it hovered for a half a minute, and flew at an incomparable speed. it scared me badly, because i used to live near a military base and an airport in md, and have never seen any craft like this, it barely made any sound! when it shot out of site, the cars started moving again, but during the incident a male in the car in front of me actually yelled out his window, "what the &$@% is that." i knew we were all thinking what the heck it really was. i can tell you now, i'm no longer a skeptic when it comes to ufo's.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was driving west on midway when a few cars stopped in front of me. i heard a humming and other people in front of me were looking out their windows at the object. at first it was a large whitish hovering orb but expanded, changed shape.
